entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -19.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 04:00 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023
Temperature: -19.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -25.7°C
Wind: SE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Blizzard. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Blizzard developing late this afternoon. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains late this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind light except east 40 km/h gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 March 2023
